law.catch_line: An insurer that issues or renews a private passenger motor vehicle insurance policy in the State sha...
law.text: An insurer that issues or renews a private passenger motor vehicle insurance policy in the State shall give an actuarially justified discount in rate to each individual who has completed the immediately preceding 3 years of continuous coverage with that insurer without a moving traffic violation, with not more than one point, and with no chargeable traffic accident.
